title: Strike | Episode 3
description:
Veronica is growing suspicious of Clementine’s blindness and Shadow is growing wary of Veronica. Dodson and Crewdson realize that world-changing files were stolen when “Client Four” escaped. [Adult Content. Graphic Language]
~~
From QCODE, makers of fantastic audio fiction. Visit QCODEMedia.com to learn more. And, check out some of our other shows including: The Left Right Game with Tessa Thompson, Borrasca with Cole Sprouse, Blackout with Rami Malek, Soft Voice with Naomi Scott.
